articles.title: Veteran actor-filmmaker Manoj Kumar dies at 87
articles.description: The industry veteran, whose films ruled the box office in the late 1960s and 1970s, had been ailing for a while and died of age related issues at the Kokilaben Ambani Hospital around 3.30AM
